titles.title: Of inquiry requesting the President to transmit certain documents to the House of Representatives relating to the investigation by the intelligence community into the origins of the COVID-19 virus.
Of inquiry requesting the President to transmit certain documents to the House of Representatives relating to the investigation by the intelligence community into the origins of the COVID-19 virus.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select).
Reported by the Committee on Intelligence. H. Rept. 117-620.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 161.

bill.summary: This resolution requests the President to provide the House of Representatives any documents and information about the investigation by the intelligence community into the origins of the COVID-19 virus.
